snippet: The Chinese commerce ministry announced that a case had been filed with the World Trade Organization, part of a continuing conflict over the sales of solar energy equipment and components.
abstract: Chinese commerce ministry files case with World Trade Organization, accusing some European Union countries of violating free trade rules with policies that favored purchase of solar energy equipment produced in Europe; case is part of continuing conflict over sales of solar energy equipment and components.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese commerce ministry announced that a case had been filed with the World Trade Organization, part of a continuing conflict over the sales of solar energy equipment and components.

headline.seo: China Retaliates Against European Union in Solar Trade Dispute
headline.main: China Files W.T.O. Case Against Europe
headline.print_headline: China Files W.T.O. Case Against Europe
